R

receiveMessage() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.MessageService
Deprecated.
use #com.networks.p2pchat.Sender instead
Receiver - Class in com.networks.p2pchat
A receiver object listens on a stream for new Messages, when one is received, the message is passed to the conversation object that is holding the Receiver
Receiver(InputStream, Conversation) - Constructor for class com.networks.p2pchat.Receiver
Standard constructor Takes a Conversation object to pass new messages on to and an InputStream object on which to listen for new messages
removeAddress(String) - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.AddressBook
Remove the key-value pair for AddrIp from the list
removeClientWindow(String) - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.GraphicInterface
Remove a client window from the list (and display).
removeUser(Peer) - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.Channel
Removes a user from the channel, that user will have to rejoin (and supply the password if neccessary) if they want to continue posting messages to this channel.
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.ClientWindow
The thread run loop, is called when the thread starts running.
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.ConnectionListener
Run loop for the listen thread, listens for new connections and passes the sockets of new connections back to post office.
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.Conversation
 
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.LoginWindow
 
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.PostOffice
Thread run loop, this function overloads the implementation from Runnable.
run() - Method in class com.networks.p2pchat.Receiver
Main run-loop which waits around for messages to be send to it through the inputStream
